title: Jack [1976 PAL DVD][Sv Sub[SvHID]
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0074704/5,5" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0074704/5,5</a>


Jack is 25 years old. With his pals, he keeps running around in Stockholm ... Smoking joints, drinking wine and hunting for girls. However, in contrast to many Jack knows what he wants, he'll be a writer. In his company are Bart, who are trying to be an artist, and Harold who's dealing with drugs. They hang out with Jonny, who is a photographer and his girlfriend, Linnea. Together they experience the joy and sorrow, philosophize about life and make a trip to Gotland on a cycling holiday.
Back home again Jack tries to get started with the writing and the time is emerging what to write about - their friends' fates, and what it means to be young in the 70-century Sweden.
